# Ticket Template (M1)

## Context
What is broken or missing, and why now.

## Objective
Clear expected outcome in one sentence.

## Scope
- In scope item 1
- In scope item 2
- Out of scope item

## Agent owner
`agent:UI` | `agent:Backend` | `agent:Data` | `agent:QA`

## Tasks
- [ ] Task 1
- [ ] Task 2
- [ ] Task 3

## Acceptance criteria
- Measurable condition 1
- Measurable condition 2

## Validation evidence
- Commands run
- Test results
- Deployment URL/version when applicable

## Dependencies
- #<issue-id>
